apiuser.label: User Name
apiuser.comment: This username will be checked from every App while a session is set up between the App and the Magento store.

apikey.label: Api Key
apikey.comment: This key will be checked from every App while a session is set up between the App and the Magento store.

use_token.label: Use token for Api communications
use_token.comment: Use token will add check and refresh the token with every request.

visible_on_app.label: On Manage Products enable Hide on App
visible_on_app.comment: Enable this option to choose whether or not this product is visible in the app

exclude_attribute_on_details.label: Exclude attributes on Product Details
exclude_attribute_on_details.comment: These attributes will be excluded in Additional Info tab

klarna_popup_urls.label: Klarna Popup URLs
klarna_popup_urls.comment: URLs that will be shown as pop-up in checkout page.

display_order_from.label: Enable Order From in orders list
display_order_from.comment: Select to view which orders are from JMango360

display_customer_from.label: Enable JMango360 User in Customers list
display_customer_from.comment: Select to view which customers are from JMango360

shared_key.label: Shared Encoding Key
shared_key.comment: The shared, secret encoding key that is used to encrypt user information

displaycode.label: Deployment Zone
displaycode.comment: Enter display code from Site Manager

fq.label: Filtering and Sorting Review
fq.comment:
Enter each line a query string.
Example: Filter|ContentLocale:eq:nl_NL,en_GB

tc.label: Terms & Conditions
tc.comment: Customize the terms and conditions that your users will see for all submissions

enable.label: Enable debug logging
enable.comment: Log requests to japi.log. Disable in production.

exclude_modules.label: Exclude modules
exclude_modules.comment: List of modules need bypass session validation. Enter each line a module name, ex "TIG_PostNL"
